mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice WHERE id LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%' AND title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' ORDER BY nseq DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title=#{title} , content=#{content} WHERE nseq=#{nseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(nseq, title, content, id) VALUES(notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{id})
